name: Lilla Mini Adventure
description:
A small personal project.

My own character Lilla walking on forest looking for her wings.

Working with some self made resources, and some free I got here in itch.io.

I have no experience, no deadline and no need to rush. Just learning some things with tutorials and experimenting until I can finish my first game!

It's on a very alpha phase. There's a bunch of bugs and unfinished things to work on!

Any help, comment and suggestion is welcome.

Commands:
A&D/Arrows: Walk
Left Shift: Run
Space: Jump / Double Jump
Left Ctrl & Mouse: Pause

WIP List (Trello): https://trello.com/b/C0t6Rgsz/lilla-mini-adventure
